attributes.action: Raise the minimum wage to be the same as the living wage.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to enforce a National Living Wage and make it law that every company and organisation pays their employees as wage which they can live independently on.
attributes.background: Make the minimum the same as the national living wage for everyone regardless of their age. 16-22 year old are old enough to leave home and school to work full time so they deserve to be eligible for the national living wage.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634861
To make minimum wage equal for all ages to end age discrimination for pay
